<Heading

  children={"Request"}
>

  parameters={[]}
>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"settings":{"type":"object","properties":{"unitPreference":{"type":"string","example":"METRIC","enum":["METRIC","IMPERIAL"]},"notificationEnabled":{"type":"boolean","example":true},"notificationTime":{"type":"string","example":"08:00:00"}}},"reminders":{"description":"Rappels à mettre à jour","example":[{"type":"PERIOD_START","enabled":true,"time":"08:00:00"}],"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"objectives":{"description":"Objectifs à mettre à jour","example":[{"type":"WEIGHT_LOSS","note":"Perdre 5kg en 3 mois"}],"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"featureFlags":{"description":"Flags de fonctionnalités à mettre à jour","example":[{"feature":"ADVANCED_ANALYTICS","isEnabled":true}],"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}},"required":["settings"],"title":"UpdateSettingsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Paramètres mis à jour avec succès","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string","example":"Paramètres mis à jour avec succès","description":"Message de confirmation"},"settings":{"type":"object","properties":{"unitPreference":{"type":"string","example":"METRIC"},"notificationEnabled":{"type":"boolean","example":true},"notificationTime":{"type":"string","example":"08:00:00"}}},"updatedReminders":{"type":"number","example":2,"description":"Nombre de rappels mis à jour"},"updatedObjectives":{"type":"number","example":1,"description":"Nombre d'objectifs mis à jour"},"updatedFeatureFlags":{"type":"number","example":3,"description":"Nombre de feature flags mis à jour"}},"required":["message","settings","updatedReminders","updatedObjectives","updatedFeatureFlags"],"title":"UpdateSettingsResponseDto"}}}},"400":{"description":"Données invalides ou erreur de validation"}}}

</StatusCodes>
